About the Company: Galada Finance Limited (GFL) is a fast growing Non-Banking Financial Company based in Chennai having been incorporated as a Private Limited Company in the year 1986 under Companies Act, 1956 and converted to a Public Limited Company in the year 1994. GFL is predominantly engaged in the business of Hire Purchase and Leasing. GFL is one of the leading finance & Insurance solutions provider, providing finance for Car & other automobiles, business & construction equipments, property mortgage, insurance solutions and more.
